description: An instance of a director animation.
title: DirectorAnimationConfig

___idleTime.description: Is there a time to wait for start after user interaction ? If yes, specify a time in ms. If the time is negative, it is considered that the animation never resume.
___idleTime.title: Idle time

___stoppable.description: Can the user stop the animation ?
___stoppable.title: Stoppable

___delay.description: Is there a timer to wait for start ? If yes, specify a time in ms.
___delay.title: Delay

___smooth.description: Does the animation have a smooth start from the actual point the camera is looking at.
___smooth.title: Smooth

___tracks.description: The list of tracks UID ot execute. The tracks are executed in the order they are written in this array.
___tracks.title: Tracks
